title: Relates to prohibiting colleges from denying formerly incarcerated individuals admittance to college based solely on their incarceration
summary: Relates to prohibiting colleges from denying formerly incarcerated individuals admittance to college based solely on their incarceration.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting colleges from denying formerly incarcerated individuals admittance to college based solely on their incarceration
